autonomous_agent_apis.name: RestGPT
autonomous_agent_apis.description: RestGPT is a large language model-based autonomous agent framework that connects LLMs with RESTful APIs, enabling agents to control real-world applications such as movie databases and music players.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: AgentQL REST API
autonomous_agent_apis.description: AgentQL provides REST API endpoints specifically designed for autonomous AI agents to dynamically pull in real-world data and integrate with various business processes.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: FastMCP
autonomous_agent_apis.description: FastMCP is a lightweight server that takes an OpenAPI specification and automatically converts API endpoints into tools that AI agents can understand and call, enabling seamless integration with existing REST APIs.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: MCP Server Tools
autonomous_agent_apis.description: A collection of open-source and commercial tools to convert traditional REST APIs into MCP servers, making them accessible to autonomous agents.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: APIDNA
autonomous_agent_apis.description: APIDNA is a SaaS platform that leverages autonomous AI agents for seamless, secure, and efficient automated API integrations, simplifying complex enterprise integrations.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: Manhattan Agent Foundry
autonomous_agent_apis.description: Manhattan Agent Foundry enables enterprises to build, deploy, and scale autonomous AI agents for smarter, faster supply chain decision-making.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: CrewAI
autonomous_agent_apis.description: CrewAI is a multi-agent platform that allows users to build a crew of AI agents to autonomously interact with enterprise applications and automate workflows, with or without code.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: Teradata Enterprise AgentStack
autonomous_agent_apis.description: Teradata’s AgentStack streamlines the building, deployment, and management of autonomous AI agents for enterprises, focusing on scalability and integration with business data.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: Agentforce (Salesforce)
autonomous_agent_apis.description: Agentforce by Salesforce facilitates building autonomous AI agents for managing tasks across marketing, sales, and customer service, focusing on business process automation.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: Automation Anywhere Agentic Process Automation
autonomous_agent_apis.description: Automation Anywhere’s Agentic Process Automation enables cross-functional enterprise automation using autonomous agents that go beyond traditional bots.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: Sendbird AI Agent API
autonomous_agent_apis.description: Sendbird offers AI Agent APIs to facilitate the creation, management, and operation of autonomous agents, especially for customer communication and support.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: Sema4.ai Enterprise AI Agents
autonomous_agent_apis.description: Sema4.ai provides enterprise automation with AI agents, focusing on cost reduction, expedited decision-making, and consistent business operations.
